EmailTemplate.subject: RE: IT Maturity Survey - Continuing the Conversation (1495629383.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 ChiangFeng, Thank you again for completing the Turbonomic IT Maturity Survey. By now, you should have received your $25 Amazon Gift Card via email. I am reaching out again because I wanted to follow up on my previous note; based upon your answers to our survey, I believe Turbonomic could provide tremendous value to your organization, and I’d like to show you why. Furthermore, we are offering a $100 gift card or a $100 donation to a charity of your choice, in your name, if you choose to engage in a 30-minute consultation with us to learn about Turbonomic. However, in order to receive this gift card or have the donation made, you must schedule this meeting before the end of next week (May 26th) and complete it before June 16th (you will receive the second gift card via email within 48 hours of meeting completion). Are you available over the next couple of days for a 30 minute intro? If you agree to engage in a proof of value with us after this initial introduction, we are also offering to make an additional $1,000 donation in your name to a charity of your choice. Best, James From: James Wilcox Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2017 10:34 AM To: 'chiangfeng.li@talgov.com' <chiangfeng.li@talgov.com> Subject: IT Maturity Survey - Continuing the Conversation Hi ChiangFeng, Thank you for completing the Turbonomic IT Maturity Survey! You should receive your Amazon Gift Card shortly. I can offer you another $100 Amazon Gift Card or a $100 donation to a charity of your choice if I can schedule 30 minutes between you and a Turbonomic Engineer. You indicated on your survey several challenges that Turbonomic directly addresses, specifically: - Overprovisioned Infrastructure and Inefficiency - Turbonomic has been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent consolidation - Troubleshooting/Proactive Monitoring - Turbonomic has been proven to decrease performance alerts by 80% or more through its patented automation engine - Service Degradation/Downtime - Turbonomic has been proven to increase application performance by 37% while eliminating 80% of tickets - Growth in Environment Complexity - Turbonomic’s vendor-agnostic, patented analytics have been proven to reduce infrastructure requirements by 30% or more through intelligent
Do you have some time to speak over the next couple of weeks? To receive your gift card or donation, you must schedule your consultation within the next 7 days and complete it within the next 14 days. Thank you, Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive
